summary: Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCU) educated more than 226,000 African-American students pursuing a college degree in 2017. Among other things, the Small Business Administration works with colleges and universities to provide entrepreneurial training and counseling for students and adjacent communities. We looked at how SBA has worked with HBCUs. SBA’s efforts included providing training and counseling through its Small Business Development Center program, with...
title: Small Business Administration: Opportunities Exist to Strengthen Engagement with Historically Black Colleges and Universities
